biotools.summary: CREAMMIST is an integrated cancer drug sensitivity database for in vitro pharmacogenomics analysis, providing an integrative dose-response curve across five widely used cancer cell-line drug-response datasets (CCLE, GDSC1, GDSC2, CTRP1, CTRP2).

bioschemas.name: CREAMMIST
